54382.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ニュースですの:
Here is the news! The Salon Salon Fe Lycia will finally open all over again. I have been selected to work at
the salon as an apprentice. Please come and visit me at my store in a big town. It's like a dream come true for
me to be able to work at the salon of my dreams. I will do my very best!

54383.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「わたくし サ:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>I was an apprentice hairdresser at
Salon Fee Lycia. I got fed up with my
days of training and ran away.<bw_break>

54384.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「でも 結局 行くあ:
But in the end, I had nowhere to go. As a proof of my remorse, I decided to go home with fresh new colors that I
can use at the salon. For that, I need Lava Berries that <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> in Boronus Lava Flow sometimes drops.

54385.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「思い切って お願い:

you. If you think I'm pathetic, please
let me have the Lava Berries.

54386.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「ああっ ありがとう:

54387.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「ああっ ありがとう:

54388.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「そうですか……。ボ:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>I hear that Boronus Lava Flow is a
place full of tough monsters. What
shall we do?

54389.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「わたくし 美:
I would like to ask my seniors' forgiveness for my escaping from my training by creating a fresh new color
that can be used at Salon.

54390.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「そのためには ボロ:

54392.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「まあっ 旅のお:

to get your hands on some Lava
Berries?

54393.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「まあっ わたくしの: <attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>Oh, was I wrong? I don't like it.

54395.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「ふぅ…… ふぅ……:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>I didn't know Lava Berries was so hot.
I'm going to get back on track and
start making new colors.

54396.<se_nots joutyu SUCCESS>「まず ようがんイチゴを ナベに:
First, put the Lava Berries in a saucepan. Then, slowly stirring the mixture, I let it boil down to a thick
sauce. Hmmm. I think it's about time. Then I'll cast my magic on it and it will be ready to serve.

54397.「え ええと…… マジカル マジカル？\n ジャムジャマジャミー！ ……ですのよ:
Uh, uh, Magical, Magical, Magical?
Jamu Jamu Jammy! It's "Jamu Jamammy!

54398.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「で…… で……:

and fruity new color! The new fresh
fruity color!

54399.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「うわーん すっ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Wow, I'm soooooo happy! Thank you so
much. This is my way of saying thank
you.

54400.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「こんなにも ス:
